item.description:
Event: This event will feature two leisurely walks on trails through beautiful gardens, meadows and some towering pines (the former grounds to the Maudsley Estate). The first walk will be approximately 45-60 minutes long, followed by a picnic-style lunch on the green overlooking the Merrimac River. The second walk (optional) will be approximately 75-90 minutes long, depending on stops for scenic viewing. Dogs/children/families welcome. For Park info to go: http://www.mass.gov/d...
Trip Coordinator : Stephanie Mitchell, cedimeister@yahoo.com
Meet: Sunday, August 29th @ 11 AM at Maudsley State Park, Curzon Mill Rd in Newburyport (a 9:30 train out of North Station arrives in Nbpt at 10:31). Stephanie will provide transportation to and from the Park for those of you taking the train. Arrangements will be made when you RSVP. Rain Cancels
RSVP: Is required by 8/27, contact Stephanie at the email address above for more details and. try to include a phone number for contact on the day of the event
Cost: Admission is free unless you drive, then it is $2 for parking, For a Meetup members, $5 that will be credited towards a full Mosaic of Ma membership of $25
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP to Stephanie at cedimeister@yahoo.com to confirm registration and get the details

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Walk/Picnic at Maudsley State Park
